articles.title: Good news for Aussie legend Patty Mills - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Kyrie Irving’s Covid-19 vaccine status could open the door for Aussie star Patty Mills to take centre stage in his first season at the Brooklyn Nets.
articles.content: One stars vaccine status could bode well for Aussie basketballer Patty Mills, who is gearing up for his first season with the Brooklyn Nets.Kyrie Irving’s Covid-19 vaccine status could open the door … [+2646 chars]
